title: Advancing blast fragmentation simulation of RC slabs: A graph neural network approach
excerpt: This paper is about data-driven simulation of close-in blast fragmentation of concrete slabs using GNN
citation: Li, Qilin, et al. "Advancing blast fragmentation simulation of RC slabs: A graph neural network approach." Engineering Structures 308 (2024):118009.

title: Machine learning prediction of BLEVE loading with graph neural networks
excerpt: This paper is about data-driven simulation of BLEVE blast wave propagation
citation: Li, Qilin, et al. "Machine learning prediction of BLEVE loading with graph neural networks." Reliability Engineering & System Safety 241 (2024):109639.
